subject: Boston Marathon
Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: Keflezighi became the first American to win the Boston Marathon since 1983 when he crossed the finish line last April. At 40, he will compete in this year’s race with new goals.
snippet: Keflezighi became the first American to win the Boston Marathon since 1983 when he crossed the finish line last April. At 40, he will compete in this year’s race with new goals.
